title: Tags Exploration (distribution and shared tags)
description: Shared TagsExplore tags that are used in more than one categories I build the needed DataFrame myself. Using sklearn CountVectorizer might be a quicker and maybe more reusable solution, but I find the following lines short and intuitive enough for the task.
